style: 2D hand-drawn animation, watercolor-inspired, traditional Japanese animation cel aesthetic, NOT 3D CGI

father_young.description: Handsome South Asian male, warm gentle expression, soft brown eyes with crow's feet, thick dark eyebrows, well-groomed black mustache, light stubble, wavy black hair, cream kurta with rolled sleeves, dark brown pants, worn leather chappals, silver watch, carpenter's weathered hands

father_middle.description: Same man aged with stress, hunched shoulders, deeper worry lines, grey streaks at temples, salt-and-pepper mustache, 3-day stubble with grey, tight jaw, tired weary eyes, disheveled hair, worn faded kurta, cracked chappals, scratched watch, swollen knuckles

father_older.description: Elderly peaceful presence, fully silver-grey hair, deep smile lines, white-grey mustache well-groomed, white stubble, gentle wise brown eyes, peaceful tired smile, soft beige kurta, reading glasses on cord, thin worn watch, weathered hands like old wood, wedding ring

son_child.description: Small South Asian boy, enormous dark innocent eyes, thick lashes, gap-toothed smile with missing front tooth, chubby soft cheeks, thick black messy bowl-cut with cowlick, oversized white shirt (father's), khaki shorts with string belt, bare dusty feet, scuffed knees, small hands reaching upward in wonder

son_teenager.description: Lanky South Asian teenager 5'9", angular teenage features, dark eyes closed off emotionless, thick eyebrows, tight jaw, patchy stubble beard, shoulder-length black hair across forehead hiding face, dark grey tight t-shirt, worn jeans, scuffed sneakers, defensive hunched posture, closed body language

son_adult.description: Handsome South Asian male, striking mature features, strong jawline, full well-groomed black beard with few grey streaks, warm intelligent dark brown eyes (father's eyes), long thick black hair in low bun with silver-grey at temples, black henley rolled sleeves, dark jeans, brown leather boots, inherited silver watch, messenger bag, thoughtful peaceful presence

usage_notes.aesthetic: 2D hand-drawn animation with watercolor-inspired painting style, gentle pastel tones, soft expressive line work, traditional Japanese animation cel aesthetic
usage_notes.improvements_from_v1: Changed from 3D CGI clay figures to proper 2D hand-drawn Ghibli style, added mustache to all father variations, corrected to watercolor aesthetic with soft edges
usage_notes.fal_veo_usage: Use these URLs in image_urls array for FAL Veo 3.1 reference-to-video (up to 3 per scene)
usage_notes.character_consistency_strategy: Scene 1 uses 3 character views, Scene 2+ uses 2 character views + previous scene last frame
usage_notes.multi_character_scenes: Use primary character's 3 refs, describe secondary character in detailed text (cannot mix father + son refs in same image_urls array)
usage_notes.url_format: All URLs are permanent HTTPS hosted on Cloudinary, globally accessible, FAL-compatible
